turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I mean, unless Ace made his bet.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: That's enough now!

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Ace.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Keepin' Remo happy with money was the greatest insurance policy in the world.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Hey, Nick. Vien acca. [Italian- American slang for 'Come here']

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I'll be right out.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: T'aggia parla. [Italian-American slang for 'I've got to talk to you'] Nicky... See that guy?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Mm.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Keep a good eye on him. He's makin' a lot of money for us. And he's gonna continue makin' a lot of money for us, so keep a good eye on him.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Mm.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Not like your fuckin' friends out there, that... without brains.  Okay?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Uh-huh. Mi raccomando. [Italian- American slang for 'I'm counting on you']

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Fine.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Want me to take this for you?

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: Uh-huh. Good.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: But I knew how to keep the bosses happy. Whenever they gave me little jobs to do, you know, to send a message, I would carry things out...

turns.speaker: GAGGI
turns.text: And how are things going down there?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Hi, Jennifer.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Pleasure.  Very nice to meet you.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Hi, how are you?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Okay, Sammy.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Tell me.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I know it wasn't a nice thing to do but -

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah, no shit.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Well, you gotta understand it. He doesn't know if this guy is shaking you down or taking advantage of you.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: No! No! I told him all about the guy before we ever got married. This is no fuckin' surprise.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Oh, you did? I didn't know that.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah. He's just a friend of mine I was trying to help, so... so what?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You know... the first time I ever saw your guys together... I never saw him so happy. I mean, I know he's a crazy Jew fuck and everything, but...

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I never see - You know, I never seen him act like that with anybody else. I think he's crazy about you. I mean, he really loves you. He does.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, come on. I went into this with my eyes open, you know. I knew the bottom could drop out at any time. I'm a working girl, right?  You don't think I'm gonna go into a situation like this if I don't think I'm gonna get covered on the back end.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Am I right?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I can see that. Sure.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: So, he put aside some jewelry for me. A lot of jewelry.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You mean, like a lot of expensive jewelry? About how much?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Mm, you want to steal it?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: No. I - I'm just curious, you know. I was wonderin' how much he would put into a thing like that. That's all.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm told it's worth about a million dollars, maybe more.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Well, there you go. But what does that tell ya? A million dollars in jewelry. Does that tell you the guy is crazy about you, or what?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I should have never married him. He's a Gemini. A triple Gemini... duality.  Gemini's the snake. You know you can't trust the snake.  I mean it.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I know what you mean.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Listen, Ginger... you know, this is probably not... I don't have the answers anyway... and this is probably not what you want to hear right now, because you're a little upset with Ace.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I do.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I understand that. But, you know, I think you should try to make the best of it now. Go slow, you know. See what happens.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He could have killed him! Okay? He could have killed him.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He didn't have to hit him. It's not exactly like I'm sleepin' with the guy! And he makes me sneak around to see my own friends! What the fuck is that all about?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Well, I guess it's 'cause he loves you so much. He's jealous and worried.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He gives a fuck what I do?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Look, I'll try to find out what the hell's goin' on. When I see him I'll talk to him.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah.  Thanks.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: And take it easy with this shit, will you? I mean, this can only make matters worse.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, come on.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You're a beautiful girl. You don't want to ruin your looks. I've seen a lot of girls get shot to hell from this stuff.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: You're so nice.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Come on, now, I don't want to see you unhappy.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: It's all right.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You just relax. Nobody's killin' anybody, do you hear?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: No, I really do. I think he's gonna kill me.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You just relax, and call me back here in exactly an hour, on this phone, and I'll see what I can do.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah, uh-huh... Okay.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: So, I'm gonna call you back in an hour... at this number, and you're gonna be there, right?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I'll be there.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: And listen, don't do anything else crazy, okay? You all right? Okay.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Bye.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I mean, listen, two people don't get along, at some point you gotta call it... I mean, it's none of my business, but I ... I think that's what you gotta do. You gotta take it somewhere -

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, you're right, I know.  It's... well, I was just -

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What? What?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Nothin'.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What were you gonna say? Go ahead.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I don't -

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Tell me what you were gonna say. Go ahead.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Well, I was thinkin', maybe... you know somebody at the bank...  could help me get my jewelry out?  There's a lot of money in there. Lot of money in there, and I'd be willing to take care of anybody who helped me out.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Let me think about that.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: See who I got in there. Gotta get somebody I can trust.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Mm-hm.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You know?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah. 'Cause, you know,  He's never gonna give me my jewelry.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Hm.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He holds that key so tight, he's probably got it stuck up his ass.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah, right. That's Sammy. And he's probably got it there too.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He's so fuckin' lucky. I could have buried him. I could have gone to Europe and taken the baby. And then he'd've tracked me down and he'd've killed me.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: No, he wouldn't. I would have.  And he'd've been right, too. I mean, seriously.  Well, there's one thing you don't do. You don't take a guy's kid and then take off.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I didn't.  I didn't. I mean, I did, but then I did exactly what you told me to do, and I came right back.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You did. You're right.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Exactly.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You did. I like that. I like that. That's what I like about you. You did the right thing.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I did what you told me to.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yes, you did.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: 'Cause you always tell me the right thing to do.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah.  Boy, he really fucked himself up out here -  - didn't he?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Sure did.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Everything went to his head.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: No, he's not.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: He really thinks who the fuck he is, I'll tell you that.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Exactly.  He hates me.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He hates my fuckin' guts.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Come on, come on, you're a toughie. You can take this.  Don't cry.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm not as tough as you think I am.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yes, you are.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm not and he scares the shit out of me. I never know what he's gonna do.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Come on. Don't be scared.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I need some help. I do. I need some help.  You gotta help me. I need a new sponsor, Nicky.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I do. I need a new sponsor.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Is that what you want?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: A sponsor.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Mm... okay. Don't worry about it. Nobody'll fuck with ya anymore. I'll take care of ya.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Nicky, please...

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yes, I will. It's what you want, isn't it? Huh?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Thank you. Yeah, yeah, yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: It's what you want?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah. Uh-huh -

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What did I tell you? Supposing he goes back home and makes a fuckin' beef?  I gotta know exactly what you said. Tell me what you said to him.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Me? I said... nothin'. I said, I said, 'No, no, no.' Everything he said, I just kept sayin' no.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I told you this was fuckin' dangerous. Remember I said, 'Ginger, this is a dangerous situation. Be very careful.' You fuckin' yessed me to death.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: If it's so fuckin' dangerous, then why don't you kill him?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I'm not gonna kill him. Shut the fuck up. What, do you know what you're talkin' about? I'm not killing anyb-

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, well, then, have him killed and get it over with.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Hey, don't be such a fuckin' smartass, will you?  I mean, I know the fuckin' guy thirty-five years, I'm gonna fuckin' whack him for you?  Fuck... motherfucker! I knew this, I knew it.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: What about my money?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: How the fuck am I gonna get your fuckin' money now? You think he's gonna give you fuckin' money? Are you out of your mind?!  Look what you just did to this fuckin' guy! If you would have just kept your fuckin' mouth shut!  Ah, what the fuck is the use? I should've never got invol-

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Ah, you fuck! You're such a fuckin' asshole!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Get the fuck out of here. Get out! Get the fuck out!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Get the fuck out of here.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I don't need you! I have my own fuckin' money!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right, all right.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm going' to the FBI! I'm not scared anymore!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right. Be careful.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: You fucked with me for the last time!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Okay, yeah.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: So, what'd you say to that fuckin' jerk anyway?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I told him I was Mrs Sam Rothstein.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Well, you might as well get somethin' out of it.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: You know, I've got to do some shopping afterwards. Do you want to go?

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Well, you know...

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: ...same outfit.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: But I saw something...

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Thank you. Very nice.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I told you I was hot tonight.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.  Thank you very much. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Thank you, sir, I appreciate that. Everybody, thanks. Gives some chips as tips to the dealer and box man. Thanks. Take care, Steve. Take chances and drive fast.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Ginger, honey.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Come on.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: What's the matter?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: What do you mean, 'What's the matter?' I made a lot of money for you. I want my cut.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: What money? I've seen you stealing from me.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: What money?  Look at this stack of chips. Don't give me that shit. I want my end.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Ginger, I've been watching you all night. You've been stealing from me.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Don't give me that shit. I want my money.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: That bag's full of fuckin' chips you

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: What do you mean 'stole'? I didn't steal anything from you.

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Get lost, Ginger! Get lost!

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Get lost?

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Get lost?

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Well, how 'bout that?

turns.speaker: HIGH ROLLER
turns.text: Come on!

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Okay?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Where are you goin'? Where are you? You're in that place. Where are you?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm here.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: No, you're not. Where are you? Where are you?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I'm always here for you.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: You are.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I am.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Don't make me come there. Answer me.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Bub-ut, baby, do you know that I love you too?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: No, Lester.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Do you know that?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Yeah. This is the best thing I can do for my life right now.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: So, it's gonna be okay, isn't it?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Promise?

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: God... I wish you...

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: ...all the luck in the world.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: You do?

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Yeah, I do. I mean, it's - it's the - it's the best thing you can do right now. I mean this. And you'll have real security.  Sweetheart... you're gonna be situated just right in Vegas.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: - with stupid braces on your teeth.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Okay, then.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Every time I ever see you, that's what I see.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Uh, talk to you later.  Bye.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: What does that mean? No, I know that look. What does that mean?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: It means I got the money.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: You got money. That's a - That's a good look.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: We'll go later.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: We're going to Europe. Let the adults talk.  You dye your hair... you get plastic surgery, like we talked about. Right? You're the mother. How much do you think he's gonna pay to get this fuckin' kid back?

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Don't give me any of your shit!  Okay, this has always been a dream, but we're going.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Lester - he called you here.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Here.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: He was just on the phone.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: He called you right here.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: I just talked to him.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: So, he knows where you are. That means he's sending some guys over here probably right now.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: Ginger... It means he's sitting by the phone like a dumb-bell, waiting for me to call him back. Now, I -

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: That's - Yeah, he's sitting by the phone like a dumb-bell, just waiting for you to call him back. That's what he's -

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: He's sittin' by the phone -

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: What do you think we're gonna do? He's probably got guys outside the fuckin' house!

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Get your bag! Come on, get your bag! Get your things! Let's go!

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: It's this bullshit. It's just bullshit right here. This is the fuckin' problem, you know.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Oh, what bullshit? What, do you want to fuckin' talk it over now?

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: You're done yakkin', okay? You're done yakkin' now?

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Go! Go! Get in the car! Go!

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: 'Go! Go! Go!'

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: Just knock it off! Would you two knock it off? Get in the car.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: She started it. She started the whole thing. I'm just standin' here.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: You're not gonna drive. Don't even think you're gonna drive.

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: No, I'm gonna drive.

turns.speaker: LESTER
turns.text: No, I'm not gonna drive with some crazy -

turns.speaker: GINGER
turns.text: You're driving me nuts!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: - back to  Nigeria.  Yeah.

turns.speaker: HOTEL RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: Listen...

turns.speaker: HOTEL RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: ...they're in Penthouse K.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: They check in alone?

turns.speaker: HOTEL RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: They checked in alone.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Are they out now?

turns.speaker: HOTEL RECEPTIONIST
turns.text: Yes, don't worry.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Excuse me, but I folded these things beautifully and I would appreciate a little respect. Jesus Christ!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Don't look at me, pal. I gotta live with her.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: There's more!

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: There's more! There's a couple stuck in there. I know there's more.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: God, I'm telling you, they're out!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Come on, damn it. Don't get so defensive. It could be stuck in your hair, you know.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Look, there aren't...  There aren't but...

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Oh, there aren't?  What's that?  Huh? What's that.  There's no more. Thanks, hon.

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Hey, how you doin'?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Hey. Hey, Sammy, how are you?

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Wow.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Boy, look at this place, huh?

turns.speaker: JENNIFER
turns.text: Incredible.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: How many of these you gonna eat, huh?

turns.speaker: LITTLE NICKY
turns.text: Two.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Two?

turns.speaker: LITTLE NICKY
turns.text: Mm-hm.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You know why, right?

turns.speaker: LITTLE NICKY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: LITTLE NICKY
turns.text: 'Cause it clogs up your heart.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What a smart kid you are!  Okay, eat.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Well, how come I laid nine?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: 'Cause you're a jag-off. I would have fuckin' made you lay ten...

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Hold it, hold it. Here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Ace saw Vegas one way.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You call this guy and tell him I'm comin'?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Smarten up.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You jag-off.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: ...you big fuckin' hick, you. Come here. Come here. Get him up. Come here.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Get up.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Come here, come here.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Get up.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You go over there right now and you apologize. You better hope he lets you back in.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Sometimes I used to go along on a heist just for the fun of it. But I didn't like the people I was rippin' off lookin' at me, so I used to turn their fuckin' pictures around.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What's takin' so long over there?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: This peter's a motherfucker.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Whenever we got local merch, we'd usually send it to Palm Spring or Arizona... LA. I had a couple of sand niggers out there. You know, Arabs.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: What, are you gonna have a fuckin' meeting here, or are you gonna buy some diamonds?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I actually turned my bedroom into a bank vault where I kept the choice stuff.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: She asleep?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Every night, on the couch.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Give all the guys in your crew a piece of that?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: I took care of everybody.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You walk past me?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Hey. This is Shelly.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Hey, Shelly.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: And this is Stacy.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Stacy.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: This is Nick.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Pleasure.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: ...Remo and the guys used to hang out and count their millions.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Remo.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I mean, the cops knew, but they didn't give a fuck. I mean, you know, they all worked it out together.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Nicky sends his warmest regards.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Fine. Everything's goin' good.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: ...to a tee. Like the time Tony Dogs...

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah, thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: But he never talked.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: ...bosses. I mean, they're smokin' their Di Nobilis and they're eatin' a trippa [Italian-American slang for 'tripe'.] and fuckin' suffritt', you know, fried pigs guts? While, if I wanna talk private, I gotta go to a fuckin' bus stop.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: But, hey, what do they care, as long as I keep sendin' money back.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah, but they're complaining.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Let 'em complain. I'm the one who's here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I do all the work. Somebody don't like it, fuck him.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: It's up to you.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: They want a fuckin' war, I'm ready.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Mm.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Fuckin' Jews stick together, don't they?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: They're havin' a good time too.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: So are we.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: He's here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You should pay as fast as you collect, you know.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Sue me, you Jew fuck!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Let's get out of here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: What? Get out of here? I got a marker comin'.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: You must have drunk too much.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Go fuck yourself.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: He asked me again about you and the Jew's wife.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Walk, walk, walk. What'd you say?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: He asked me again about you and the Jew's wife.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah, what'd you tell him?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: I told him I didn't know nothin'. But Jiggs and, uh, Tony Gorilla said if you did anything, you're fucked up.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You think he's goin' home, makin' a beef behind my back?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Nah. You would've heard somethin'.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah, what's to stop him?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: I know. I know.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I don't trust him anymore. But they'd never okay anything, you know?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah, but they keep askin' about it.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Well, now, sure they're askin'. They earn with the prick. I got a funny feelin' he's gonna start a fuckin' war or somethin'.  I'm not sure yet, you know. But I w- You know, but you know what I want you to do?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Who's this guy? Who's this guy?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Oh, he ain't nobody.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You know what I want you to do? Get a couple of guys to dig a hole in the desert, then let 'em show you where it's at.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Angelo and Buster.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah, but I'm not sure yet.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: They'll do it.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: And when I'm ready, I'll say the words, 'Go see the Jew.'

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: And you make it disappear, you know what I mean?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah, just let me know. But you gotta be ready. You know what I'm talkin' about?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Did I say to do anything yet? I said I'm not sure... I'll let you know. I want to think about it. Where're these pricks at?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Don't know.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Dominick said they're in the motel?

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Yeah, either that or in the fuckin' bank. I don't know. They're all over the joint.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Calm down, calm down. Shh!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Shh.  Hide her car in the back!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Whoa. Calm down.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Get out. Get out! Get out!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Take it easy!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Why'd I get involved with this fuckin' nut in the first place? Get out!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: You're gonna fuckin' kill her. Take it easy.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Get her the fuck out of here. Get her out of here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I fucked up, Frankie. I fucked up good this time. Should have never started with this fuckin' broad.

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Take it easy. What could you do? I mean, she threw herself at you, right?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I'm in a bad fuckin' spot here. You know that? Bad fuckin' spot.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Frankie!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: No more! You see? Watch!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Frankie! Frankie, you piece of shit!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Fuck you, you motherfuck!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: No more fuckin' dirty work!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: No, no, no, no!

turns.speaker: MARINO
turns.text: Take him out! Take this motherfucker out!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Listen to me, Anthony. I got your head in a fuckin' vise. I'm gonna squash your fuckin' head like a grapefruit if you don't give me a name. Don't make me have to do this, please. Come on. Don't make me be a bad guy. Come on.

turns.speaker: TONY DOGS
turns.text: Fuck you!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: This motherfucker, do you believe this? Two fuckin' days and nights!  Fuck me?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Oh, God! Give me the fuckin' name!

turns.speaker: TONY DOGS
turns.text: Ch-Charlie M!

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Charlie M?

turns.speaker: TONY DOGS
turns.text: Charlie M.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Charlie M? You make me pop your fuckin' eye out of your head to protect that piece of shit? Charlie M? You dumb motherfucker!

turns.speaker: TONY DOGS
turns.text: Kill me, you fuck, kill me.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Kill you,  You motherfucker you!  Frankie, do him a fuckin' favor.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Tony.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: How you doin'?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: How you doin'?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: All right, yeah. You got that thing for me?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: What thing? Oh, Nicky... I thought you was layin'.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I was layin'? No, no, I'm taking it. I was takin' it.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: You sure?

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: I'm positive.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Well, I'm a little confused here.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: You're a little confused?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Maybe if I stick your fuckin' face through this window over here like, you know, you'll - you'll get unconfused. Give me the fuckin' money!

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: I'm sorry, Nicky. I didn't mean anything by it.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Yeah, I know, that's why you had it ready. You thought I was fuckin' layin' it?!

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: My fuckin' head.

turns.speaker: NICKY
turns.text: Your fuckin' head, huh? Don't fuck around, Tony.

turns.speaker: SENATOR
turns.text: Pardon me, counselor. Before you continue...

turns.speaker: OSCAR
turns.text: No, I want to have this marked, Mr. -

turns.speaker: SENATOR
turns.text: ...this, uh, this Commission is prepared to act on a motion denying the Rothstein application.

turns.speaker: OSCAR
turns.text: Denying?

turns.speaker: SENATOR
turns.text: Do I hear a motion seconded?

turns.speaker: OSCAR
turns.text: Mr. Chairman -

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: Hey! Oh!

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: Oh, sorry -

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: What's the matter with you?

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: Receipts and bills and... everything's here.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: Since when do you talk like that?

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: There's a lot of people here.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: Nance gives me trouble and I'll tell him... screw around with those suitcases and I'll take the eyes out of his frickin' head.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: Again!

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: I didn't curse. I said 'frickin' head'.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: That's enough.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: I've never trusted him. And you know I got eyes...

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: ...behind my head. They trust that scumbag, I don't. Right now, the way I feel, I'll hit the two of them in the head with a fuckin' shovel.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: All right, take it easy now, take it easy.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: Mom, I'm sorry, they're beatin' me left and right.  Ma, I'm sorry. I'm all upset.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: I know, but that's enough.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: You know - You know - You know what they're doin' to me?

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: I know it, I know it.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: I can't take this no more. Back and forth, back and forth.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: Take it easy, though.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: All right, all right. But I - I -

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: You'll get a heart attack like that.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: You know, I - I'm too upset right now. And - An end has to be put to this.

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: ...everything's comin' out of my pocket. I gotta pay for all these trips back and forth, back and forth.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: You are right. What can I...

turns.speaker: PISCANO
turns.text: ...done right, you gotta do it yourself.

turns.speaker: PISCANO'S MOTHER
turns.text: Then do it the way you want.

turns.speaker: SHERBERT
turns.text: Hiya. That's a lot of money to be counting out in public.

turns.speaker: WINNER
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: SHERBERT
turns.text: Why don't I take him over to the office and verify it, huh?

turns.speaker: WINNER
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: SHERBERT
turns.text: Having a good time?

turns.speaker: WINNER
turns.text: Yes, uh...

turns.speaker: SHERBERT
turns.text: You'll want to count the money in privacy. You know, you don't need...

turns.speaker: WINNER
turns.text: Uh, I have a plane to catch to Cleveland...  Can I get my winnings?

turns.speaker: CAPTAIN GOD
turns.text: Hey, Hot Stuff. You're still on the clock...

turns.speaker: ADONIS
turns.text: Sorry, sir. The Cult is my life and my life is the Cult. By God, Captain God, I shall not fail you..

turns.speaker: ADONIS
turns.text: The crowd bought it.

turns.speaker: CAPTAIN GOD
turns.text: Crowd always buys it. What do we got?

turns.speaker: CAPTAIN GOD
turns.text: Do I have to remind everyone that in two days, we'll all be dead. The Cult of Good will be a memory. I don't want to hear about lawsuits or cereals. We have a secret mission...

turns.speaker: ADONIS
turns.text: I still have to call my agent--my techno-single just made the hot 100...what's with the phone?

turns.speaker: CAPTAIN GOD
turns.text: You have to dial nine first.

turns.speaker: ADONIS
turns.text: Oh Man, not the sewer, I just had this cape cleaned...

turns.speaker: CAPTAIN GOD
turns.text: It's okay. Let her go.
